r.s: A package providing a common interface to image drawing, making output independent on the library used.
r.d: A package providing a common interface to image drawing, making output independent on the library used.
r.n:
First released package in PEAR
Changes since last PEPr release: * Added support for image maps - a separate canvas (Image_Canvas_ImageMap) has been created to accomplish this * Added support for antialiasing images when using GD (both using native GD method and Image_Graph own implementation) * Added support for multi line texts * Added a toHtml() method for to easy facilitate including canvas in HTML (this includes the associated image map, if any) * Added line ends - only supported in GD canvases currently and not on polygons (yet!)
